comments.raw_text: If a device is removed from the downloaded blacklist, the required driver version pref is left set. This shouldn't have any practical negative consequences, but nsIGfxInfo::getFeatureSuggestedDriverVersion() will return this version if it's called.
comments.creator: joe@drew.ca
comments.author: joe@drew.ca
comments.text: If a device is removed from the downloaded blacklist, the required driver version pref is left set. This shouldn't have any practical negative consequences, but nsIGfxInfo::getFeatureSuggestedDriverVersion() will return this version if it's called.
